title: Architect system design: Docker containerization strategy
notes: Design Docker architecture: frontend and backend container configurations, docker-compose setup, volume mounts, and development vs production configurations. Document in a design file.

title: Architect system design: backend API design and data layer
notes: Design the Python backend architecture: API routes, data models, JSON file persistence layer with atomic writes, and error handling strategy. Document in a design file.

title: Setup backend: Initialize FastAPI project structure with proper module organization
description: Create the backend Python project structure: app directory, main.py, routers/, models/, services/, and utils/. Configure pyproject.toml with required dependencies.

title: Setup backend: Implement core API endpoints for Projects CRUD
description: Implement GET/POST/DELETE /api/projects endpoints. Handle project deletion gracefully (tasks become Inbox).

title: Architect system design: frontend stack selection and component structure
notes: Analyze requirements for frontend framework (React/Vue/Svelte), decide on TypeScript structure, component organization, and state management approach. Document in a design file.

title: Setup frontend: Initialize React TypeScript project with Vite
description: Create frontend React project using Vite with TypeScript. Configure Tailwind CSS or styled-components, set up src structure with components/, hooks/, types/, and utils/ directories.

title: Setup frontend: Implement main tasks view with filtering and sorting
description: Create the main tasks panel with views: All/Active/Completed. Implement filtering by project and sorting by priority/due_date/created_at.

title: Setup frontend: Implement project selection sidebar
description: Build the sidebar component to display projects list, handle project creation/deletion/renaming, and show project selection state.

title: Setup backend: Implement Settings API endpoint
description: Implement GET/PUT /api/settings endpoint with theme and sort_order fields. Ensure persistence to settings.json.

title: Setup backend: Implement JSON file persistence layer with atomic writes
description: Create the data persistence layer with lock files, atomic writes using temp+rename pattern, JSON validation, and auto-repair on corruption. Implement projects.json, tasks.json, and settings.json handlers.

title: Setup frontend: Implement task detail drawer for editing
description: Build the detail drawer component with inline editing for task fields: title, notes, priority, due_date, project assignment. Include optimistic updates.

title: Setup backend: Implement core API endpoints for Tasks CRUD
description: Implement GET/PUT/POST/DELETE /api/tasks and POST /api/tasks/{id}/toggle endpoints with proper validation and error handling.

title: Setup frontend: Implement theme toggle (light/dark mode)
description: Create theme toggle functionality that persists to settings.json. Ensure smooth transitions and proper theme application across all components.

title: Architect system design: integration patterns between frontend and backend
notes: Define the integration contract: API endpoint specifications, error handling patterns, optimistic update strategy, and data sync approach. Document in a design file.
